summary.span: 提供列舉的基底類別。

span.span: Provides the base class for enumerations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列舉類型是一組具名常數，其基礎類型是任何整數類資料類型。An enumeration is a set of named constants whose underlying type is any integral type. 如果明確宣告沒有基礎類型，用。If no underlying type is explicitly declared, is used. 是.NET Framework 中的所有列舉的基底類別。 is the base class for all enumerations in the .NET Framework. 列舉型別由定義`enum`關鍵字在 C# 和`Enum`...`End Enum`在 Visual Basic 中建構。Enumeration types are defined by the `enum` keyword in C# and the `Enum`...`End Enum` construct in Visual Basic. 提供方法來比較這個類別的執行個體、 執行個體的值轉換為其字串表示，將數字的字串表示轉換成這個類別的執行個體並建立指定的列舉型別和值的執行個體。 provides methods for comparing instances of this class, converting the value of an instance to its string representation, converting the string representation of a number to an instance of this class, and creating an instance of a specified enumeration and value. 您也可以將列舉視為位元欄位。You can also treat an enumeration as a bit field. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[非獨佔成員和 Flags 屬性](#Flags)區段和主題。For more information, see the [Non-Exclusive Members and the Flags Attribute](#Flags) section and the topic. 本主題內容：In this topic: [建立列舉類型](#Creating) [Creating an enumeration type](#Creating) [具現化列舉型別](#Instantiating) [Instantiating an enumeration type](#Instantiating) [列舉的最佳作法](#BestPractices) [Enumeration best practices](#BestPractices) [執行作業列舉型別](#Operations) [Performing operations with enumerations](#Operations) [執行轉換Performing conversions](#conversions) [列舉值剖析Parsing enumeration values](#parsing) [格式化的列舉值Formatting enumeration values](#formatting) [逐一查看列舉成員Iterating enumeration members](#iterating) [非獨佔成員和旗標屬性Non-exclusive members and the Flags attribute](#Flags) [加入列舉方法Adding enumeration methods](#methods) ## 建立列舉類型Creating an enumeration type 程式語言通常提供來宣告列舉，其中包含一組具名的常數，其值的語法。Programming languages typically provide syntax to declare an enumeration that consists of a set of named constants and their values. 下列範例會說明 C# 和 Visual Basic 用來定義列舉類型的語法。The following example illustrates the syntax used by C# and Visual Basic to define an enumeration. 它會建立名為列舉型別`ArrivalStatus`，有三個成員： `ArrivalStatus.Early`， `ArrivalStatus.OnTime`，和`ArrivalStatus.Late`。It creates an enumeration named `ArrivalStatus` that has three members: `ArrivalStatus.Early`, `ArrivalStatus.OnTime`, and `ArrivalStatus.Late`. 請注意，在這兩種情況下，列舉型別沒有明確繼承自; 繼承關聯性由編譯器隱含地處理。Note that in both cases, the enumeration does not explicitly inherit from ; the inheritance relationship is handled implicitly by the compiler. [!code-csharp[System.Enum.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.class/cs/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Enum.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.class/vb/class1.vb#1)] > [!WARNING] > 您絕對不要建立其基礎類型為非整數類列舉型別或。You should never create an enumeration type whose underlying type is non-integral or . 雖然您可以使用反映來建立這類列舉型別，方法會呼叫使用產生的型別不可靠，而且可能也會擲回其他例外狀況。Although you can create such an enumeration type by using reflection, method calls that use the resulting type are unreliable and may also throw additional exceptions. ## 具現化列舉型別Instantiating an enumeration type 您可以具現化列舉型別就如同任何其他的值類型具現化： 藉由宣告變數和指派給它的其中一個列舉的常數。You can instantiate an enumeration type just as you instantiate any other value type: by declaring a variable and assigning one of the enumeration's constants to it. 下列範例會具現化`ArrivalStatus`其實`ArrivalStatus.OnTime`。The following example instantiates an `ArrivalStatus` whose value is `ArrivalStatus.OnTime`. [!code-csharp[System.Enum.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.class/cs/class1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Enum.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.class/vb/class1.vb#2)] 此外，您也可以以下列方式初始化的列舉值：You can also instantiate an enumeration value in the following ways: - 使用特定的程式設計語言的功能 （如 C#) 轉型或轉換 （如同在 Visual Basic) 的整數值的列舉值。By using a particular programming language's features to cast (as in C#) or convert (as in Visual Basic) an integer value to an enumeration value. 下列範例會建立`ArrivalStatus`物件，其值為`ArrivalStatus.Early`以這種方式。The following example creates an `ArrivalStatus` object whose value is `ArrivalStatus.Early` in this way. [!code-csharp[System.Enum.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.class/cs/class2.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Enum.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.class/vb/class2.vb#4)] - 藉由呼叫其隱含的預設建構函式。By calling its implicit default constructor. 如下列範例所示，在此情況下列舉型別執行個體的基礎值為 0。As the following example shows, in this case the underlying value of the enumeration instance is 0. 不過，這不一定在列舉中的有效常數的值。However, this is not necessarily the value of a valid constant in the enumeration. [!code-csharp[System.Enum.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.class/cs/class2.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Enum.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.class/vb/class2.vb#3)] - 藉由呼叫或方法來剖析字串，包含在列舉常數的名稱。By calling the or method to parse a string that contains the name of a constant in the enumeration. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[剖析列舉值](#parsing)> 一節。For more information, see the [Parsing Enumeration Values](#parsing) section. - 藉由呼叫方法，將整數值轉換為列舉類型。By calling the method to convert an integral value to an enumeration type. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[執行轉換](#conversions)> 一節。For more information, see the [Performing Conversions](#conversions) section. ## 列舉的最佳作法Enumeration best practices 我們建議您在定義列舉型別時使用下列最佳作法：We recommend that you use the following best practices when you define enumeration types: - 如果您有未定義列舉的成員，其值為 0 時，請考慮建立`None`列舉的常數。If you have not defined an enumeration member whose value is 0, consider creating a `None` enumerated constant. 根據預設，列舉型別使用的記憶體初始化為零的 common language runtime。By default, the memory used for the enumeration is initialized to zero by the common language runtime. 因此，如果您未定義其值為零的常數，列舉型別會包含不合法的值在建立時。Consequently, if you do not define a constant whose value is zero, the enumeration will contain an illegal value when it is created. - 如果您的應用程式必須代表，請考慮使用列舉的明顯預設案例常數的值為零來表示。If there is an obvious default case that your application has to represent, consider using an enumerated constant whose value is zero to represent it. 如果沒有任何預設的情況，請考慮使用的任何其他列舉常數的列舉的常數其值為零，若要指定未表示的大小寫。If there is no default case, consider using an enumerated constant whose value is zero to specify the case that is not represented by any of the other enumerated constants. - 請勿指定保留供未來使用的列舉的常數。Do not specify enumerated constants that are reserved for future use. - 當您定義的方法或將做為值的列舉常數的屬性時，請考慮驗證此值。When you define a method or property that takes an enumerated constant as a value, consider validating the value. 原因是即使在列舉中未定義該數字的值可以轉換為列舉類型的數值。The reason is that you can cast a numeric value to the enumeration type even if that numeric value is not defined in the enumeration. 中所列的常數是位元欄位的列舉型別的其他最佳作法[非獨佔成員和 Flags 屬性](#Flags)> 一節。Additional best practices for enumeration types whose constants are bit fields are listed in the [Non-Exclusive Members and the Flags Attribute](#Flags) section. ## 執行作業列舉型別Performing operations with enumerations 當您建立列舉型別時，您無法定義新的方法。You cannot define new methods when you are creating an enumeration. 不過，列舉型別繼承一組完整的靜態和執行個體方法，從類別。However, an enumeration type inherits a complete set of static and instance methods from the class. 下列各節調查大部分的這些方法，除了使用列舉值時常用的數種其他方法。The following sections survey most of these methods, in addition to several other methods that are commonly used when working with enumeration values. ### 執行轉換Performing conversions 您可以使用轉型 （C# 中） 或 （在 Visual Basic) 的轉換運算子的列舉成員和其基礎類型之間轉換。You can convert between an enumeration member and its underlying type by using a casting (in C#) or conversion (in Visual Basic) operator. 下列範例會使用轉型或轉換運算子，以執行轉換，同時從給列舉值的整數和列舉值為整數。The following example uses casting or conversion operators to perform conversions both from an integer to an enumeration value and from an enumeration value to an integer. [!code-csharp[System.Enum.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.class/cs/class2.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Enum.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.class/vb/class2.vb#5)] 類別還包括將任何整數類資料類型的值轉換為列舉值的方法。The class also includes a method that converts a value of any integral type to an enumeration value. 下列範例會使用方法，將轉換至`ArrivalStatus`值。The following example uses the method to convert an to an `ArrivalStatus` value. 請注意，因為傳回值的型別，轉型或轉換運算子的用法還是可能需要將物件轉換成列舉型別。Note that, because the returns a value of type , the use of a casting or conversion operator may still be necessary to cast the object to the enumeration type. [!code-csharp[System.Enum.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.class/cs/class2.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Enum.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.class/vb/class2.vb#6)] 當將整數轉換為列舉值，它有可能指派不是實際的列舉型別成員的值。When converting an integer to an enumeration value, it is possible to assign a value that is not actually a member of the enumeration. 若要避免這個問題，您可以將整數傳遞至方法，然後再執行轉換。To prevent this, you can pass the integer to the method before performing the conversion. 下列範例會使用這個方法來判斷是否可以轉換成整數值的陣列中的項目`ArrivalStatus`值。The following example uses this method to determine whether the elements in an array of integer values can be converted to `ArrivalStatus` values. [!code-csharp[System.Enum.Class#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.class/cs/classconversion1.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Enum.Class#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.class/vb/classconversion1.vb#7)] 雖然類別提供的明確介面實作介面將來自列舉值轉換為整數類型，您應該使用的方法類別，例如至執行這些轉換。Although the class provides explicit interface implementations of the interface for converting from an enumeration value to an integral type, you should use the methods of the class, such as , to perform these conversions. 下列範例說明如何使用連同方法方法，將列舉值轉換成其基礎類型。The following example illustrates how you can use the method along with the method to convert an enumeration value to its underlying type. 請注意，此範例不需要將列舉編譯時期已知的基礎類型。Note that this example does not require the underlying type of the enumeration to be known at compile time. [!code-csharp[System.Enum.Class#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.class/cs/classconversion2.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Enum.Class#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.class/vb/classconversion2.vb#8)] ### 列舉值剖析Parsing enumeration values 和方法可讓您將列舉值的字串表示轉換成該值。The and methods allow you to convert the string representation of an enumeration value to that value. 名稱或基礎值的列舉常數，可以是字串表示。The string representation can be either the name or the underlying value of an enumeration constant. 請注意，剖析方法將會成功轉換不屬於特定列舉型別，如果可以將字串轉換成列舉的基礎類型的值的數字的字串表示法。Note that the parsing methods will successfully convert string representations of numbers that are not members of a particular enumeration if the strings can be converted to a value of the enumeration's underlying type. 若要避免此情形，可以呼叫方法，以確保剖析方法的結果是有效的列舉值。To prevent this, the method can be called to ensure that the result of the parsing method is a valid enumeration value. 此範例將示範這個方法，並示範同時呼叫和方法。The example illustrates this approach and demonstrates calls to both the and methods. 請注意，非泛型剖析方法會傳回物件，您可能必須轉型 （C# 中），或 （在 Visual Basic) 會轉換成適當的列舉類型。Note that the non-generic parsing method returns an object that you may have to cast (in C#) or convert (in Visual Basic) to the appropriate enumeration type. [!code-csharp[System.Enum.Class#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.class/cs/classparse1.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Enum.Class#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.class/vb/classparse1.vb#9)] ### 格式化的列舉值Formatting enumeration values 您可以藉由呼叫靜態列舉值將轉換成其字串表示法方法，以及執行個體的多載方法。You can convert enumeration values to their string representations by calling the static method, as well as the overloads of the instance method. 您可以使用格式字串來控制在其中一個列舉值表示為字串的精確方式。You can use a format string to control the precise way in which an enumeration value is represented as a string. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[列舉格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings.md)。For more information, see [Enumeration Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings.md). 下列範例會使用每個支援的列舉格式字串 （"G"或"g"、"D"或"d"、"X"或"x"，和"F"或"f"） 轉換的成員`ArrivalStatus`列舉成其字串表示。The following example uses each of the supported enumeration format strings ("G" or "g", "D" or "d", "X" or "x", and "F" or "f" ) to convert a member of the `ArrivalStatus` enumeration to its string representations. [!code-csharp[System.Enum.Class#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.class/cs/classformat1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Enum.Class#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.class/vb/classformat1.vb#10)] ### 逐一查看列舉成員Iterating enumeration members 類型未實作或介面，讓您逐一查看集合的成員，使用`foreach`（C# 中） 或`For Each`（在 Visual Basic) 建構。The type does not implement the or interface, which would enable you to iterate members of a collection by using a `foreach` (in C#) or `For Each` (in Visual Basic) construct. 不過，您可以列舉兩種方式中的成員。However, you can enumerate members in either of two ways. - 您可以呼叫方法來擷取字串陣列，包含列舉成員的名稱。You can call the method to retrieve a string array containing the names of the enumeration members. 接下來，針對字串陣列的每個項目，您可以呼叫方法，將字串轉換為其相等的列舉值。Next, for each element of the string array, you can call the method to convert the string to its equivalent enumeration value. 下列範例將示範這個方法。The following example illustrates this approach. [!code-csharp[System.Enum.Class#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.class/cs/classiterate.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Enum.Class#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.class/vb/classiterate.vb#11)] - 您可以呼叫方法來擷取陣列，其中包含基礎值的列舉型別。You can call the method to retrieve an array that contains the underlying values in the enumeration. 接下來，為陣列的每個項目，您可以呼叫方法，將整數轉換為其相等的列舉值。Next, for each element of the array, you can call the method to convert the integer to its equivalent enumeration value. 下列範例將示範這個方法。The following example illustrates this approach. [!code-csharp[System.Enum.Class#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.class/cs/classiterate.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.Enum.Class#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.class/vb/classiterate.vb#12)] ## 非獨佔成員和旗標屬性Non-exclusive members and the Flags attribute 列舉的常見用法之一是代表一組互斥的值。One common use of an enumeration is to represent a set of mutually exclusive values. 例如，`ArrivalStatus`執行個體可以具有值為`Early`， `OnTime`，或`Late`。For example, an `ArrivalStatus` instance can have a value of `Early`, `OnTime`, or `Late`. 沒有任何意義的值`ArrivalStatus`反映多個列舉常數不正確的執行個體。It makes no sense for the value of an `ArrivalStatus` instance to reflect more than one enumeration constant. 在其他情況下，不過，列舉型別物件的值可以包含多個列舉成員，而且每個成員代表位元欄位中的列舉值。In other cases, however, the value of an enumeration object can include multiple enumeration members, and each member represents a bit field in the enumeration value. 屬性可以用來表示列舉型別包含的位元欄位。The attribute can be used to indicate that the enumeration consists of bit fields. 例如，名為列舉`Pets`可能用來指示家裡寵物的類型。For example, an enumeration named `Pets` might be used to indicate the kinds of pets in a household. 可以如下所示定義。It can be defined as follows. [!code-csharp[System.Enum.Class#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.class/cs/classbitwise1.cs#13)] [!code-vb[System.Enum.Class#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.class/vb/classbitwise1.vb#13)] `Pets`列舉再使用，如下列範例所示。The `Pets` enumeration can then be used as shown in the following example. [!code-csharp[System.Enum.Class#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.class/cs/classbitwise1.cs#14)] [!code-vb[System.Enum.Class#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.class/vb/classbitwise1.vb#14)] 定義位元時，應使用下列最佳作法列舉型別，並套用屬性。The following best practices should be used when defining a bitwise enumeration and applying the attribute. - 使用列舉型別只有位元運算 (AND、 OR、 互斥 OR) 是一個數字值上執行的自訂屬性。Use the custom attribute for an enumeration only if a bitwise operation (AND, OR, EXCLUSIVE OR) is to be performed on a numeric value. - 定義列舉常數的 2 乘冪，也就是 1、 2、 4、 8 等等。Define enumeration constants in powers of two, that is, 1, 2, 4, 8, and so on. 這表示中結合的列舉常數的個別旗標不會重疊。This means the individual flags in combined enumeration constants do not overlap. - 請考慮建立列舉的常數的常用的旗標組合。Consider creating an enumerated constant for commonly used flag combinations. 例如，如果您有檔案 I/O 作業所使用的列舉，包含列舉的常數`Read = 1`和`Write = 2`，請考慮建立列舉的常數`ReadWrite = Read OR Write`，哪些結合`Read`和`Write`旗標。For example, if you have an enumeration used for file I/O operations that contains the enumerated constants `Read = 1` and `Write = 2`, consider creating the enumerated constant `ReadWrite = Read OR Write`, which combines the `Read` and `Write` flags. 此外，用來結合旗標位元 OR 運算可能會視為一種進階的概念在某些情況下，應該不需要簡單的工作。In addition, the bitwise OR operation used to combine the flags might be considered an advanced concept in some circumstances that should not be required for simple tasks. - 如果您將定義是負數值為旗標的列舉常數，因為許多旗標位置可能會設定為 1，這可能會讓程式碼會造成混淆，並且鼓勵大家編碼錯誤，請務必小心。Use caution if you define a negative number as a flag enumerated constant because many flag positions might be set to 1, which might make your code confusing and encourage coding errors. - 便利的方式來測試是否在數值中設定旗標是呼叫執行個體方法，如下列範例所示。A convenient way to test whether a flag is set in a numeric value is to call the instance method, as shown in the following example. [!code-csharp[System.Enum.Class#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.class/cs/classbitwise1.cs#15)] [!code-vb[System.Enum.Class#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.class/vb/classbitwise1.vb#15)] 它相當於執行旗標列舉的常數，設定所有位元中的數字的值為零未對應至旗標，數字的值之間的位元 AND 運算，並測試該作業的結果是否等於旗標列舉的常數。It is equivalent to performing a bitwise AND operation between the numeric value and the flag enumerated constant, which sets all bits in the numeric value to zero that do not correspond to the flag, and then testing whether the result of that operation is equal to the flag enumerated constant. 下列範例可說明此點。This is illustrated in the following example. [!code-csharp[System.Enum.Class#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.class/cs/classbitwise1.cs#16)] [!code-vb[System.Enum.Class#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.class/vb/classbitwise1.vb#16)] - 使用`None`所旗標名稱列舉的常數，其值為零。Use `None` as the name of the flag enumerated constant whose value is zero. 您無法使用`None`中的位元 AND 運算，以測試是否旗標，因為結果永遠為零的列舉的常數。You cannot use the `None` enumerated constant in a bitwise AND operation to test for a flag because the result is always zero. 不過，您可以執行的邏輯不之間的數字值的位元運算、 比較和`None`列舉的常數，以判斷是否會設定數字的值中的任何位元。However, you can perform a logical, not a bitwise, comparison between the numeric value and the `None` enumerated constant to determine whether any bits in the numeric value are set. 下列範例可說明此點。This is illustrated in the following example. [!code-csharp[System.Enum.Class#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.class/cs/classbitwise1.cs#17)] [!code-vb[System.Enum.Class#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.class/vb/classbitwise1.vb#17)] - 未定義的列舉值，只是要鏡像的列舉型別本身的狀態。Do not define an enumeration value solely to mirror the state of the enumeration itself. 例如，未定義列舉的常數，只會標記列舉結尾。For example, do not define an enumerated constant that merely marks the end of the enumeration. 如果您需要判斷列舉的最後一個值，請明確檢查該值。If you need to determine the last value of the enumeration, check for that value explicitly. 此外，您可以執行進行範圍檢查的第一個和最後一個列舉常數的範圍內的所有值都是有效。In addition, you can perform a range check for the first and last enumerated constant if all values within the range are valid. ## 加入列舉方法Adding enumeration methods 因為這類列舉型別定義語言結構`enum`(C#) 和`Enum`(Visual Basic)，您無法定義為繼承自這些方法之外的列舉類型的自訂方法類別。Because enumeration types are defined by language structures, such as `enum` (C#) and `Enum` (Visual Basic), you cannot define custom methods for an enumeration type other than those methods inherited from the class. 不過，您可以使用擴充方法，將功能加入至特定列舉型別。However, you can use extension methods to add functionality to a particular enumeration type. 在下例中，`Grades` 列舉代表班上學生可能得到的字母分級成績。In the following example, the `Grades` enumeration represents the possible letter grades that a student may receive in a class. 已將名為 `Passing` 的擴充方法新增至 `Grades` 類型，以便該類型的每個執行個體現在都「知道」它是否代表傳遞等級。An extension method named `Passing` is added to the `Grades` type so that each instance of that type now "knows" whether it represents a passing grade or not. `Extensions`類別也包含定義最小傳遞等級的靜態讀寫變數。The `Extensions` class also contains a static read-write variable that defines the minimum passing grade. 傳回值`Passing`擴充方法會反映該變數的目前值。The return value of the `Passing` extension method reflects the current value of that variable. [!code-csharp[System.Enum.Class#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.class/cs/Extensions.cs#18)] [!code-vb[System.Enum.Class#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.class/vb/Extensions.vb#18)] ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用代表具名的值，以及另一個列舉，代表具名的位元欄位的列舉型別。The following example demonstrates using an enumeration to represent named values and another enumeration to represent named bit fields. [!code-cpp[enummain#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/enummain/CPP/EnumMain.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[enummain#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/enummain/CS/EnumMain.cs#1)] [!code-vb[enummain#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/enummain/VB/EnumMain.vb#1)]

[!code-cpp[enumequals#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/enumequals/CPP/EnumEquals.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[enumequals#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/enumequals/CS/EnumEquals.cs#1)] [!code-vb[enumequals#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/enumequals/VB/EnumEquals.vb#1)] 下列範例會定義兩種列舉類型，`SledDog`和`WorkDog`。The following example defines two enumeration types, `SledDog` and `WorkDog`. `SledDog`列舉型別有兩個成員，`SledDog.AlaskanMalamute`和`SledDog.Malamute`，具有相同的基礎值。The `SledDog` enumeration has two members, `SledDog.AlaskanMalamute` and `SledDog.Malamute`, that have the same underlying value. 若要呼叫方法表示這些值是否相等的因為它們的基礎值相同。The call to the method indicates that these values are equal because their underlying values are the same. `SledDog.Malamute`和`WorkDog.Newfoundland`成員具有相同的基礎值，雖然它們代表不同的列舉型別。The `SledDog.Malamute` and `WorkDog.Newfoundland` members have the same underlying value, although they represent different enumeration types. 呼叫方法表示這些值是否不相等。A call to the method indicates that these values are not equal. remarks.format:
## Remarks 下表顯示有效的值`format`參數。The following table shows the valid values for the `format` parameter. |格式Format|描述Description| |------------|-----------------| |"G" 或 "g""G" or "g"|如果`value`是等於具名的列舉常數，該常數名稱會傳回，否則相當的十進位`value`傳回。If `value` is equal to a named enumerated constant, the name of that constant is returned; otherwise, the decimal equivalent of `value` is returned.

例如，假設名為紅色，只有列舉的常數，其值為 1。For example, suppose the only enumerated constant is named Red, and its value is 1. 如果`value`指定為 1 時，此格式會傳回"Red"。If `value` is specified as 1, this format returns "Red". 不過，如果`value`指定為 2，這個格式會傳回"2"。However, if `value` is specified as 2, this format returns "2".

-或--or-

如果自訂屬性套用至列舉，`value`會被視為包含一個或多個位元所組成的一或多個旗標的位元欄位。If the custom attribute is applied to the enumeration, `value` is treated as a bit field that contains one or more flags that consist of one or more bits.

如果`value`等於的組合為列舉的常數，會傳回分隔符號分隔清單，這些常數的名稱。If `value` is equal to a combination of named enumerated constants, a delimiter-separated list of the names of those constants is returned. `value` 搜尋旗標，從最大值的旗標移到最小值。`value` is searched for flags, going from the flag with the largest value to the smallest value. 每個對應位元欄位中的旗標`value`，常數的名稱串連的分隔符號分隔的清單。For each flag that corresponds to a bit field in `value`, the name of the constant is concatenated to the delimiter-separated list. 該旗標的值從進一步考量中排除，則搜尋會繼續下一個旗標。The value of that flag is then excluded from further consideration, and the search continues for the next flag.

如果`value`不等於的組合名為列舉的常數，相當的十進位`value`傳回。If `value` is not equal to a combination of named enumerated constants, the decimal equivalent of `value` is returned.| |"X" 或 "x""X" or "x"|代表`value`以十六進位格式，而不前置 「 0x 」。Represents `value` in hexadecimal format without a leading "0x".| |"D" 或 "d""D" or "d"|代表`value`以十進位格式。Represents `value` in decimal form.| |"F" 或 "f""F" or "f"|"G"或"g"、 運作方式完全相同之處在於不一定要存在於上宣告。Behaves identically to "G" or "g", except that the is not required to be present on the declaration.| ## Examples 下列範例說明使用`Format`的內容中`Enum`。The following example illustrates the use of `Format` in the context of `Enum`. [!code-cpp[enumformat#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/enumformat/CPP/EnumFormat.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[enumformat#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/enumformat/CS/EnumFormat.cs#1)] [!code-vb[enumformat#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/enumformat/VB/EnumFormat.vb#1)]

[!code-csharp[System.Enum.GetValues#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.getvalues/cs/getvalues1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Enum.GetValues#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.getvalues/vb/getvalues1.vb#1)] 方法會傳回陣列，其中包含值的每個成員`enumType`列舉型別。The method returns an array that contains a value for each member of the `enumType` enumeration. 如果多個成員具有相同的值，傳回的陣列會包含重複的值。If multiple members have the same value, the returned array includes duplicate values. 在此情況下，呼叫傳回陣列中每個值的方法不會還原指派至具有重複值的成員的唯一名稱。In this case, calling the method with each value in the returned array does not restore the unique names assigned to members that have duplicate values. 若要成功擷取列舉成員的所有名稱，請呼叫方法。To retrieve all the names of enumeration members successfully, call the method. 無法在僅限反映的內容中使用反映來叫用方法。The method cannot be invoked by using reflection in a reflection-only context. 相反地，您可以使用擷取的所有列舉成員值方法來取得陣列的物件，代表列舉成員，然後呼叫陣列的每個項目上的方法。Instead, you can retrieve the value of all enumeration members by using the method to get an array of objects that represent enumeration members and then call the method on each element of the array. 下列範例說明這項技巧。The following example illustrates this technique. 它需要您在名為 Enumerations.dll 組件中定義下列的列舉型別：It requires that you define the following enumeration in an assembly named Enumerations.dll: [!code-csharp[System.Enum.GetValues#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.getvalues/cs/getvalues_reflectiononly.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Enum.GetValues#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.getvalues/vb/getvalues_reflectiononly.vb#2)] 在僅限反映的內容中，載入組件時物件，代表`Pets`列舉型別會具現化，陣列物件會擷取，並在主控台顯示欄位值。The assembly is loaded in a reflection-only context, a object that represents the `Pets` enumeration is instantiated, an array of objects is retrieved, and the field values are displayed to the console. [!code-csharp[System.Enum.GetValues#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.getvalues/cs/getvalues_reflectiononly.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Enum.GetValues#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.getvalues/vb/getvalues_reflectiononly.vb#3)] ## Examples 下列範例說明使用。The following example illustrates the use of . remarks.format: ## Remarks `value`參數可以是下列任一項：The `value` parameter can be any of the following: - 類型的任何成員`enumType`。Any member of type `enumType`. - 其值是列舉成員的型別變數`enumType`。A variable whose value is an enumeration member of type `enumType`. - 為列舉成員名稱的字串表示。The string representation of the name of an enumeration member. 字串中的字元必須為列舉成員名稱相同的大小寫。The characters in the string must have the same case as the enumeration member name. - 基礎類型的值`enumType`。A value of the underlying type of `enumType`. 如果中的常數`enumType`定義一組的位元欄位和`value`值、 名稱或基礎值的多個的位元欄位，包含方法會傳回`false`。If the constants in `enumType` define a set of bit fields and `value` contains the values, names, or underlying values of multiple bit fields, the method returns `false`. 換句話說，定義一組的位元欄位的列舉，此方法會判斷只有單一位元欄位是否屬於列舉型別。In other words, for enumerations that define a set of bit fields, the method determines only whether a single bit field belongs to the enumeration. 若要判斷是否多重位元欄位，設定標記的列舉類型中屬性，您可以呼叫方法。To determine whether multiple bit fields are set in an enumeration type that is tagged with the attribute, you can call the method. ## Examples 下列範例會定義名為列舉型別`PetType`的個別位元欄位所組成。The following example defines an enumeration named `PetType` that consists of individual bit fields. 然後它會呼叫利用基礎列舉值、 字串名稱，以及複合值所產生的設定多重位元欄位的可能方法。It then calls the method with possible underlying enumeration values, string names, and composite values that result from setting multiple bit fields. summary.span: 將這個執行個體的值轉換為它的相等字串表示。

span.span: Converts the value of this instance to its equivalent string representation.

returns.span: 這個執行個體值的字串表示。

span.span: The string representation of the value of this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回值是以一般格式規範 ("G") 格式。The return value is formatted with the general format specifier ("G"). 也就是說，如果不會套用到此列舉型別和具名的常數的值，這個執行個體，等於則傳回值是字串，包含常數的名稱。That is, if the is not applied to this enumerated type and there is a named constant equal to the value of this instance, then the return value is a string containing the name of the constant. 如果套用且有一或多個具名常數的組合等於這個執行個體的值，然後傳回值是包含以分隔符號分隔清單的常數名稱的字串。If the is applied and there is a combination of one or more named constants equal to the value of this instance, then the return value is a string containing a delimiter-separated list of the names of the constants. 否則，傳回值是數值的這個執行個體的字串表示。Otherwise, the return value is the string representation of the numeric value of this instance. 如需格式的列舉值的詳細資訊，請參閱[列舉格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings.md)。For more information about formatting enumeration values, see [Enumeration Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings.md). 如需一般格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about formatting in general, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). ## Examples 下列範例會示範將列舉的值，轉換為字串。The following example demonstrates converting an enumerated value to a string. [!code-cpp[Classic Enum.ToString2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Enum.ToString2 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Enum.ToString2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Enum.ToString2 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Enum.ToString2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Enum.ToString2 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.para: 如果多個列舉成員具有相同的基礎值，而且您嘗試擷取為列舉成員的名稱，根據其基礎值的字串表示，您的程式碼不應做任何假設該方法會傳回有關的名稱。例如，下列的列舉會定義兩個成員， Shade.Gray和Shade.Grey，具有相同的基礎值。 [！ code-csharp[System.Enum.ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.tostring/cs/tostringbyvalue1.cs#1)][！ code-vb[System.Enum.ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.tostring/vb/tostringbyvalue1.vb#1)] 下列方法呼叫會嘗試擷取之成員的名稱陰影列舉其基礎值為 1。這個方法會傳回"Gray"或"Grey"，並且您的程式碼應該讓字串將會傳回相關的任何假設。 [！ code-csharp[System.Enum.ToString#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.tostring/cs/tostringbyvalue1.cs#2)][！ code-vb[System.Enum.ToString#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.tostring/vb/tostringbyvalue1.vb#2)]

If multiple enumeration members have the same underlying value and you attempt to retrieve the string representation of an enumeration member's name based on its underlying value, your code should not make any assumptions about which name the method will return. For example, the following enumeration defines two members, Shade.Gray and Shade.Grey, that have the same underlying value. [!code-csharp[System.Enum.ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.tostring/cs/tostringbyvalue1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Enum.ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.tostring/vb/tostringbyvalue1.vb#1)] The following method call attempts to retrieve the name of a member of the Shade enumeration whose underlying value is 1. The method can return either "Gray" or "Grey", and your code should not make any assumptions about which string will be returned. [!code-csharp[System.Enum.ToString#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.tostring/cs/tostringbyvalue1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Enum.ToString#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.tostring/vb/tostringbyvalue1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 等同於方法，而不是擲回例外狀況，它會傳回`false`如果轉換失敗。 is identical to the method, except that instead of throwing an exception, it returns `false` if the conversion fails. 它就不需要例外狀況處理時剖析的列舉值的字串表示。It eliminates the need for exception handling when parsing the string representation of an enumeration value. `value`參數包含為列舉成員的具名的常數或基礎值的字串表示或以逗號 （，） 分隔的具名的常數或基礎值的清單。The `value` parameter contains the string representation of an enumeration member's underlying value or named constant, or a list of named constants or underlying values delimited by commas (,). 如果`value`包含多個名為常數或值，一或多個空格可以前面或後面的每個值、 名稱或在逗號`value`。If `value` includes multiple named constants or values, one or more blank spaces can precede or follow each value, name, or comma in `value`. 如果`value`是清單，`result`反映的指定名稱的值，或基礎值的位元結合`OR`作業。If `value` is a list, `result` reflects the value of the specified names or underlying values combined with a bitwise `OR` operation. 如果`value`的列舉值的比較名稱的字串表示法`value`與列舉型別名稱會區分大小寫。If `value` is the string representation of the name of an enumeration value, the comparison of `value` with enumeration names is case-sensitive. 如果`value`是沒有對應至具名的常數名稱`TEnum`，方法會傳回`false`。If `value` is a name that does not correspond to a named constant of `TEnum`, the method returns `false`. 如果`value`不代表的基礎值的整數的字串表示法`TEnum`列舉型別，該方法會傳回其基礎值為列舉成員`value`轉換成整數類資料類型。If `value` is the string representation of an integer that does not represent an underlying value of the `TEnum` enumeration, the method returns an enumeration member whose underlying value is `value` converted to an integral type. 如果不需要這個行為，呼叫方法，以確保特定的字串表示的整數是實際的成員`TEnum`。If this behavior is undesirable, call the method to ensure that a particular string representation of an integer is actually a member of `TEnum`. ## Examples 下列範例會定義`Colors`列舉型別，會呼叫方法，以將字串轉換成其對應的列舉值，並呼叫值的方法，以確保特定的整數值為基礎`Colors`列舉型別。The following example defines a `Colors` enumeration, calls the method to convert strings to their corresponding enumeration values, and calls the method to ensure that particular integral values are underlying values in the `Colors` enumeration. [!code-csharp[System.Enum.TryParse#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.tryparse/cs/tryparse1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Enum.TryParse#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.enum.tryparse/vb/tryparse1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 等同於方法，而不是擲回例外狀況，它會傳回`false`如果轉換失敗。 is identical to the method, except that instead of throwing an exception, it returns `false` if the conversion fails. 它就不需要例外狀況處理時剖析的列舉值的字串表示。It eliminates the need for exception handling when parsing the string representation of an enumeration value. `value`參數包含為列舉成員的具名的常數或基礎值的字串表示或以逗號 （，） 分隔的具名的常數或基礎值的清單。The `value` parameter contains the string representation of an enumeration member's underlying value or named constant, or a list of named constants or underlying values delimited by commas (,). 如果`value`包含多個名為常數或值，一或多個空格可以前面或後面的每個值、 名稱或在逗號`value`。If `value` includes multiple named constants or values, one or more blank spaces can precede or follow each value, name, or comma in `value`. 如果`value`是清單，`result`反映的指定名稱的值，或基礎值的位元結合`OR`作業。If `value` is a list, `result` reflects the value of the specified names or underlying values combined with a bitwise `OR` operation. 如果`value`的列舉值的比較名稱的字串表示法`value`列舉型別名稱將取決於`ignoreCase`參數。If `value` is the string representation of the name of an enumeration value, the comparison of `value` with enumeration names depends on the `ignoreCase` parameter. 如果`true`，比較不區分大小寫; 如果`false`，它會區分大小寫。If `true`, the comparison is case-insensitive; if `false`, it is case-sensitive. 如果`value`是沒有對應至具名的常數名稱`TEnum`，方法會傳回`false`。If `value` is a name that does not correspond to a named constant of `TEnum`, the method returns `false`. 如果`value`不代表的基礎值的整數的字串表示法`TEnum`列舉型別，該方法會傳回其基礎值為列舉成員`value`轉換成整數類資料類型。If `value` is the string representation of an integer that does not represent an underlying value of the `TEnum` enumeration, the method returns an enumeration member whose underlying value is `value` converted to an integral type. 如果不需要這個行為，呼叫方法，以確保特定的字串表示的整數是實際的成員`TEnum`。If this behavior is undesirable, call the method to ensure that a particular string representation of an integer is actually a member of `TEnum`. ## Examples 下列範例會定義`Colors`列舉型別，會呼叫方法，以將字串轉換成其對應的列舉值，並呼叫值的方法，以確保特定的整數值為基礎`Colors`列舉型別。The following example defines a `Colors` enumeration, calls the method to convert strings to their corresponding enumeration values, and calls the method to ensure that particular integral values are underlying values in the `Colors` enumeration. 方法會嘗試將轉換的字串表示具名常數為其相等的列舉值時，會使用不區分大小寫的比較。The method uses case-insensitive comparison when trying to convert the string representations of named constants to their equivalent enumeration values.
